typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CompanyKey as long,
		CurrencyCode as string,
		Name as string,
		Company as string,
		DW_Id as long,
		DW_Batch as long,
		DW_SourceCode as string,
		DW_TimeStamp as binary
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
